tool.name: dims_processing
tool.command:
#for $file in $mzxml_file: ln -f -s ${file} ${file}.mzXML && #end for
Rscript ${__tool_directory__}/dimsp.R ## input files --mzxml_file $mzxml_file --targ_file $targ_file ## output files --sign_file $sign_file #if $devi: --devi_file $devi_file #end if #if $indi: --indi_file $indi_file #end if

param.name: mzxml_file
param.label: dims data
param.help: A bunch of dims data (positive or negative mode) in mzXML format.

param.name: targ_file
param.label: Targets matrix
param.help: A data matrix containing lipid target lists (positive or negative).

param.name: devi
param.label: Produce m/z deviations table?
param.help: A single table with m/z devisations based on lipid target list

param.name: indi
param.label: Produce signal and deviation for each individual sample?
param.help: A XLSX file containing sheets of individual sample's signals and m/z deviations.

data.name: indi_file
data.label: Individual sample's signal and m/z deviation on ${on_string}

tool.help: This is a basic Galaxy wrapper for dims-processing.
